source:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Mogek appears to be pondering something.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
バール・レス広場のお利口のモグエクは、不思議がっていることがあるようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_01<tab>Mogek is concerned about Mogwon, the manager of the restoration of Asah who is on the verge of pulling out his fur in frustration. He requests that you travel to the area and inquire as to what is troubling the poor moogle.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

モグエクから、モグオンの相談に乗ってほしいと頼まれた。アサー天空廊にいる「管理係のモグオン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_02<tab>Mogwon tells you that the restoration is not proceeding nearly as fast as expected, and an exceptionally lazy moogle is to blame for the delay. This particular moogle uses all manner of excuses to put off the work he has been allocated, and Mogwon pleads with you to go and speak with him, mender to mender.
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_02<tab>モグオンと話した。一部の職人モーグリがたるんでいるので、気合を注入してほしいと頼まれた。アサー天空廊の「気が抜けたモーグリ族」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_03<tab>You try to engage the moogle, who is performing stretches in what he calls his “preparatory routine.” He chastises you for disrupting his peace and quiet before flying off to hide behind another building. Find the moogle and try to /psych him up to encourage him to get back to work.
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_03<tab>気が抜けたモーグリ族と話したところ、気だるげにしながら早々に去ってしまった。アサー天空廊の「気が抜けたモーグリ族」を探し、エモート「活を入れる」をしよう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_04<tab>You try your best to encourage the moogle to return to his tasks, but he will have none of it. Threatening that no work will be done if he is disturbed again, he flies away to hide behind another building. Encouragement having been proven ineffective, take a firmer hand and give the moogle a /slap.
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_04<tab>気が抜けたモーグリ族にエモート「活を入れる」をしたが、まだ気合が入っていないようだ。アサー天空廊の「気が抜けたモーグリ族」を探し、エモート「平手打ち」をしよう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_05<tab>Tired of the moogle's excuses, you find him once more and try to slap some sense into him. Initially at a loss for words, he quickly recovers and accuses Mogwon of hypocrisy and refuses to follow his orders. Return to Mogwon and tell him you may have unintentionally exacerbated the situation.
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_05<tab>気が抜けたモーグリ族に、エモート「平手打ち」をして気合を注入した。アサー天空廊の「管理係のモグオン」に報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_06<tab>Mogwon decides to follow Master Tarresson's advice and bribe the moogle with a splendid inducement, in the hopes that it might mollify and convince him to return to work. He asks you to craft such a piece and deliver it to the moogle saying it's from Mogwon himself.

※In the event you lose the materials or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Mogwon.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_06<tab>モグオンに報告したところ、気が抜けたモーグリ族へのねぎらいの品を作ってほしいと<var 28 ((Item)) F23D9B01 /var>を受け取った。「<var 28 ((Item)) F23D9B01 /var>」をもとに「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D8101 /var>」を製作し、アサー天空廊の「気が抜けたモーグリ族」に納品しよう。

※「<var 28 ((Item)) F23D9B01 /var>」を失った場合は、モグオンに話しかけましょう。材料を入手し、再挑戦が可能になります。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_07<tab>The moogle is overwhelmed with joy at the sight of your crafted gift. He soon reflects on his bad behavior and promises he will put more effort into his duties. Report to Mogek that you have solved Mogwon's problem.
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_07<tab>気が抜けたモーグリ族に、<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D8101 /var>を納品した。バール・レス広場の「お利口のモグエク」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_08<tab>Mogek seems somewhat surprised that a managerial moogle like Mogwon sought out advice on motivation from Tarresson. Knowing Tarresson is a bit of a trickster himself, Mogek shudders to think about what would happen if Mogwon asked him for such advice.
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SEQ_08<tab>モグエクに報告した。以前では考えられなかった、アメとムチの引き締めを行うようなモグオンの成長に驚く、モグエクなのであった。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Mogwon.
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_00<tab>管理係のモグオンと話す

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the malingering moogle.
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_01<tab>気が抜けたモーグリ族と話す

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_02<tab>/psych up the malingering moogle.
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_02<tab>気が抜けたモーグリ族に「活を入れる」をする

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_03<tab>/slap the malingering moogle.
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_03<tab>気が抜けたモーグリ族に「平手打ち」をする

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Mogwon.
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_04<tab>管理係のモグオンと話す

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_05<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize the moogle mollifier <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>)) ((Deliver the moogle mollifier <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to the malingering moogle)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_05<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((製作手帳 蛮族クエスト：<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D8101 /var>を製作)) ((気が抜けたモーグリ族に<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D8101 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_06<tab>Report to Mogek the Marvelous.
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_06<tab>お利口のモグエクに報告

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_07<tab>
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_TODO_07<tab>

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGEK_000_000<tab>Hello, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I need your help. It's about Mogwon. The last I saw him, he looked as if he was going to pull out all of his fur in frustration.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGEK_000_000<tab>探していましたくぽ。
モグオンが、冒険者さんに相談したいことがあるから、
アサー天空廊に寄るよう伝えてほしいと言っていたのですくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGEK_000_001<tab>If moogles could go bald, he would be the first, kupo! Might I trouble you to go to Asah and ask what is troubling him?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGEK_000_001<tab>どういうわけか、ちょっぴり怒り気味だったので心配ですくぽ。
行って、話を聞いてみてほしいのですくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_010<tab>Thank you for coming, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I trust Mogek sent you to inquire about the progress here in Asah? While Bahrr Lehs is nearing completion, I can't say I am content with our pace here.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_010<tab>来てくれてどうもありがとうくぽ。
実は、広場の修復がほぼ終わって気が緩んでいるのか、
ここ最近、一部の職人モーグリがたるんできているくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_011<tab>Thank you for coming, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I trust Mogek sent you to inquire about the progress here in Asah? While the plaza at Bahrr Lehs has been completely restored, I can't say I am content with our pace here.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_011<tab>来てくれてどうもありがとうくぽ。
実は、広場の修復が完了して気が緩んでいるのか、
ここ最近、一部の職人モーグリがたるんできているくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_012<tab>In fact, there is one moogle in particular who is not only a lackluster bricklayer, but a master procrastinator! He always has some sort of excuse for why he can't be bothered to put hammer to nail. I've tried everything!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_012<tab>休憩して癒やされているなんて生ぬるいくぽ。
ここはイッパツ、気合を注入する必要があるくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_013<tab>He doesn't like to listen to me, but he might lend an ear to a fellow mender, an elite one at that. Perhaps you can try giving him some words of encouragement?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_013<tab>そこでお願いくぽ。
冒険者さんから、プロの職人としての闘魂を、
ガツンと注入してやってほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_014<tab>He's not hard to miss. He's always hiding behind the buildings so that I can't clearly see what he's up to.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_014<tab>このアサー天空廊にも、「気が抜けたモーグリ族」がいるくぽ。
いざとなったら、きついイッパツを食らわせても構わないくぽ！
よろしくお願い頼むくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_015<tab>I've begged and pleaded and even tried working up some tears, but nothing worked. Maybe he'll listen to you.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_015<tab>このアサー天空廊にも、「気が抜けたモーグリ族」がいるくぽ。
いざとなったら、きついイッパツを食らわせても構わないくぽ！
よろしくお願い頼むくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SPOTMOOGLEB02318_000_016<tab>
target: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SPOTMOOGLEB02318_000_016<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_017<tab>Up, down, turn around, breathe in, breathe out, breathe in...
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_017<tab>ふぁ～あ、疲れたくぽ。
ちょっぴりモグがお休みしてても、誰にもバレないだろうし、
作業は誰かが代わりにやってくれるはずくぽ～♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_020<tab>Shhh! Can't you see I am doing my preparatory routine? A mender must be of sound mind and body, and that is achieved through profound contemplation. I must have peace and quiet!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_020<tab>いったい何の用くぽ？
モグはここで、作業の前に瞑想しているくぽ。
大事なことなんだから邪魔しないでほしいくぽ、まったく……。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The malingering moogle flutters away, muttering under his breath.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>気が抜けたモーグリ族は、
ブツクサと文句を言いながら、どこかへ去っていった。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>The malingering moogle is apparently one tough kupo nut to crack. Search for and try to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>psych<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him up.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>プロの職人として気合を入れてもらうため、
「気が抜けたモーグリ族」を見つけて「活を入れる」としよう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>Despite your best efforts, the moogle continues to ignore you. Perhaps if you were to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>psych<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him up, it would put a spring into his step.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>反応がない……。
プロの職人として気合を入れてもらうため、
「活を入れる」としよう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_030<tab>You again, kupo? I told you, if you disturb me, then I won't be able to focus and then no work will get done today! Now I have to start all over again.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_030<tab>また冒険者さんくぽ？
モグは、大事な瞑想をしているのだから、邪魔しないでくぽ。
わかったら、もうモグのところへは来ないでほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>The malingering moogle scoffs at you as he flutters away.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>気が抜けたモーグリ族は、
語気を荒げて文句を言いながら、どこかへ去っていった。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>An expert <var 08 E905 ((craftswoman)) ((craftsman)) /var> does not deserve this kind of treatment. Find the moogle once more and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>slap<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> some sense into him.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>きついイッパツでプロの職人としての闘魂を注入して、
目覚めさせるしかないだろう。
「気が抜けたモーグリ族」を見つけて「平手打ち」をしよう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>Despite your best efforts, the moogle continues to ignore you. Perhaps if you were to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>slap<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him, he would pay attention.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>何も反応がない……。
きついイッパツでプロの職人としての闘魂を注入して、
目覚めさせるため、「平手打ち」をしよう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_040<tab>D─Did you just... What... H-How can <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> slap, kupo!?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_040<tab>い、いきなり何するくぽ！
さっきからいったい何事くぽ！？

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_041<tab>Mogwon says <var 1A 02 /var>I'm<var 1A 01 /var> the one slacking off? For a moogle who does nothing but delegate all day, he has some nerve, kupo! If he's so fixated on pushing me around then he can forget it! Hmph!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_041<tab>えっ……モグオンから、たるんでると思われているくぽ？
そんな風に思われていたなんて、心外くぽ！
見返してやるくぽ、見てるといいくぽ！！

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_042<tab><mumble> ...knew I should've become a bard... <grumble>
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_042<tab>モグオンから、たるんでると思われていたなんて、心外くぽ！
見返してやるくぽ、見てるといいくぽ！！

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_050<tab>Any luck, kupo?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_050<tab>どうもありがとうくぽ。
これで、たるんだ考えを起こすことなく、
せっせと働いてくれるに違いないくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_051<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>slapped<var 1A 01 /var> him? Wow, and I thought I had some pent-up frustrations. While I appreciate your enthusiasm, it appears to have had the opposite effect. Hmmm...maybe Master Tarresson was right about trying a more traditional method.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_051<tab>もうひとつだけ、冒険者さんに頼みたいことがあるくぽ。
ここまでがんばって作業してきてくれた気が抜けたモーグリ族への、
ねぎらいの品を作ってほしいと思ってるくぽ♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_052<tab>Bribery! If you crafted him a shiny new tool, surely he would feel obligated to put more effort into the restoration?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_052<tab>冒険者さんの腕前で、
最高にイカしたかっこいい道具を作ってもらって、
ねぎらいとしてプレゼントしてやりたいくぽ♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_053<tab>Bribery! If you fashioned him a fancy set of work equipment, surely he would feel obligated to put more effort into the restoration?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_053<tab>冒険者さんの腕前で、
最高にイカしたかっこいい作業着を作ってもらって、
ねぎらいとしてプレゼントしてやりたいくぽ♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_054<tab>Bribery! If you whipped up an ointment to soothe his paws, surely he would feel obligated to put more effort into the reconstruction?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_054<tab>冒険者さんの腕前で、
モーグリの身体を癒やす軟膏を作ってもらって、
ねぎらいとしてプレゼントしてやりたいくぽ♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_055<tab>He may not deserve it, but an angry mender is worse than a lazy mender.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_055<tab>これは、アメとムチっていうやつくぽ。
タレソンさんから教わった、
みんなをやる気にさせる、極意なんだくぽ♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_056<tab>If you need any materials, let me know. Oh, and be sure to tell him it's from me when you give it to him.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_056<tab>ねぎらいの品を作るための材料は、モグが差し上げるので、
足りなくなったら声をかけてほしいくぽ！
完成したら、「気が抜けたモーグリ族」に渡してあげてくぽ♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_057<tab>We have plenty of materials on hand, you need only say the word, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_057<tab>ねぎらいの品を作るための材料は、モグが差し上げるので、
足りなくなったら声をかけてほしいくぽ！
完成したら、「気が抜けたモーグリ族」に渡してあげてくぽ♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_058<tab>Wow, you've really outdone yourself, kupo! This will perk him up for sure.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_058<tab>さすがは冒険者さん！
もう、頼んだものを作ってくださったくぽね？
早く「気が抜けたモーグリ族」に渡してあげてくぽ♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_070<tab>Oh no, it's Mogwon's personal moogle admonisher! Go away, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_070<tab>モグオンのやつめ、見てるといいくぽ！
ぐうの音も出ないぐらい、思いっきり働いてやるくぽ！！

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_071<tab>A present? <gasp> Why, it's beautiful! I...I don't know what to say, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_071<tab>これをモグにくれるくぽ？
どうもありがとうくぽ！
いったい、どんな風の吹き回しくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_072<tab>Mogwon had this made just for me? Well, uh, aren't I feeling embarrassed. After all those things I said, too...
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_072<tab>モグオンが、モグにこれを、と言ってたくぽ？
……キツイところもあるけれど、アイツは憎めないヤツくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_073<tab>...Well, I suppose I could approach my mending with a liiittle more gusto, kupo! Mogwon can be demanding at times, but to give me such a nice gift shows he truly cares. Thank you for bringing it to me.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_073<tab>こんなにいいモノをもらったら、
ますますもって、がんばらないわけにはいかないくぽ！
モグオンのヤツにも、よろしく言っといてくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_074<tab>Worked like a charm, kupo! Master Tarresson calls this the “stick and krakka root” method. He said that it is used to train chocobos to behave themselves, but it is apparently effective on moogles, too.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGWON_000_074<tab>タレソンさんから教わった極意で、
みんなの心をばっちり掴んでやるくぽ♪

source:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_075<tab>Never will I be fancy-free!♪
No one swings their hammer as dutifully as me!♪
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SULKINGMOOGLE02318_000_075<tab>こんなにいいモノをもらったら、
ますますもって、がんばらないわけにはいかないくぽ！
モグオンのヤツにも、よろしく言っといてくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGEK_000_080<tab>Did you find out what was bothering Mogwon?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGEK_000_080<tab>おかえりなさいくぽ。
モグオンは何に怒っていたのですくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGEK_000_081<tab>Somehow I'm not surprised, there's one in every bunch.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGEK_000_081<tab>ふむふむ、気が抜けた者を引き締めたかったと……。
以前のモグオンは、そんなことを考えもしなかったのに、
いつの間にタレソンさんから学んだのか、驚きですくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGEK_000_082<tab>Although it is unexpected that a moogle as serious as Mogwon would take advice from Master Tarresson. I shudder to think what other tricks he might learn.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_MOGEK_000_082<tab>職人として、技術以外のことも学べているようで何よりですくぽ。
…………でも、何だかどこか、怖い気もしますくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SYSTEM_000_083<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG606_02318_SYSTEM_000_083<tab>本クエストで製作した「NQアイテム」を所持しています。
このアイテムは、使用することはありません。
売却もできませんので、不用でしたら破棄してください。
